PyLongQt ExamplesÂ¶

These examples illustrate the basic usage of PyLongQt to setup and run electrophysiology simulations from single cells to grids of cells. We will show the basic usage of the three different expiremental protocols currently implemented in LongQt as well as a few examples of more advanced options.

2D Grid Simulation

Parameter Sensitivity Analysis

Simple Voltage Clamp

Simple Current Clamp

Download all examples in Python source code: auto_examples_python.zip
Download all examples in Jupyter notebooks: auto_examples_jupyter.zip
